name: Tyranids
lore: Some Tyranids serve as synaptic conduits or nodal relays through which a portion of the Hive Mindâ€™s iron will flows, overriding the natural instincts of the swarm to direct the teeming warrior-beasts to function as a single, gestalt organism on the battlefield.

rules.Synapse: Each time a +Tyranids+ unit from your army takes a Battle-Shock test, if it is within 6" of a friendly +Synapse+ model ("Synapse Range"), take that test on 3D6 instead of 2D6.
rules.Shadow in the Warp: Once per battle, at the start of the Battle-Round, if a model with this ability is on the Battlefield, you may force each enemy unit on the Battlefield to take a Battle-Shock test.

upgrades.name: Turbulance in the Warp
upgrades.text: All models in both armies have -1 to Psychic tests.

upgrades.name: Superior Synapse
upgrades.text: Your army's Synapse range is 7" instead of 6".

upgrades.name: Fear the Shadow
upgrades.text: All enemy units have -1 to Battle-Shock tests taken due to the Shadow in the Warp ability. Enemy units with one or more +Psyker+ models have -2 instead.
